job.title: Senior Java Software Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Title </strong>- Senior Java Software Engineer</p><p><strong>Type </strong>- Fulltime</p><p><strong>Location </strong>- <strong>San Jose, California, United States</strong></p><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Requirements:</strong></p><ul><li><strong>Four or more years of programming experience in Java, Scala and or/ Python.</strong></li><li><strong>Two or more years of experience in AWS or other Cloud platforms like Azure/GCP</strong></li><li>Two or more years of experience in Kafka or other messaging technologies such as Google Pub/Sub, RabbitMQ</li><li>Three or more years of experience in one or more databases: noSQL databases like MongoDB, Cassandra or relational databases like DynamoDB/Aurora</li><li>Experience with development frameworks, monitoring tools, command-line applications (Spring Boot, git, ssh, grafana/prometheus/datadog) and other aspects of developing in large, distributed software teams</li><li>Experience in one or more unit and e2e testing frameworks like JUnit, JMeter, Locust, BlazeMeter Exposure to Big Data pipelines and technologies.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Responsibilities:</p><ul><li>Work across technology boundaries (networking, compute, security, storage, analytics) to develop cloud native microservices to meet the strategic needs of the company</li><li>Develop a scalable system using Cloud development paradigms and constructs of distributed deployment</li><li>Ability to create quality code with good development and test practices that produce least amount of issues in the field</li><li>Work closely with Product Management and the CTO group to define the product architecture and leads its development</li><li>Assist with pre-sales customer discussions to understand the Enterprise deployment models and their requirements.</li></ul>
